Player History
Won World Championship with Detroit in 1965...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 2/8/1966 to a 2-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by New York (N) on 2/9/1968 to a 3-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
Won World Series with New York (N) in 1969...
Drafted in 1st round, 15th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 1971...
Injured on 4/12/1971 with a Tight Elbow, out for one week...
Injured on 6/4/1971 with a Tight Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Philadelphia to Minnesota on 1/31/1972 (Going to PHI: P C. Nieson, CF J. Hicks, P A. Hrabosky. Going to MIN: P J. Franklin, P J. Dukes)...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/21/1975, winning 2 games with a 2.12 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1977, going 4-0, 1.38...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1977...
Injured on 4/13/1978 with a Strained Back, out for 3 weeks...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1978...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/19/1979, winning 2 games with a 1.06 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1979, going 5-0, 1.27...
Was selected to the 1979 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1981, going 4-0, 0.69...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1982 Allstar game...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1982...
Was selected to the 1983 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1983, going 5-0, 2.37...
Won Cy Young Award in 1983, going 24-5, 2.34 ERA...
Was selected to the 1984 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1984, going 5-0, 0.69...
Had first career hit on 4/1/1985, off Moose Haas (OAK)...
Injured on 4/22/1986 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1986, going 5-0, 0.99...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1987, going 6-0, 1.87...
Was selected to the 1987 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1988 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1988, going 4-1, 1.55...
Won World Series with Minnesota in 1988...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1989, going 5-0, 0.97...
Was selected to the 1989 Allstar game...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1989, winning 2 games with a 1.93 ERA...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1990, going 5-0, 0.99...
Was selected to the 1990 Allstar game...
Injured on 9/7/1991 with a Strained Back, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Detroit on 2/15/1992 to a 1-year deal worth $2,500,000 per year...
Won World Series with Detroit in 1992...
